description:
It’s time for the final match. Kazuma of Team Japan vs. Shadow of Team America. Ja-pan vs. Go-pan. Who will win? And just how does Kazuma plan to reunite Pierrot with his parents with his bread?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atsumerareta Kyuukyoku no Shokuzai!! Shijousaidai no Kesshousen!
Les ingrédients ultimes ! La plus grande des finales !
The Ultimate Ingredients!! The Greatest Final Battle!
พาเหรดวัตถุดิบสุดยอด!! ศึกตัดสินครั้งใหญ่ในประวัติศาสตร์!
集められた究極の食材!! 史上最大の決勝戦!
